metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10875 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ansible. ansible.cfg is read from the current working directory which can be altered to make it point to a plugin or a module path under the control of an attacker, thus allowing the attacker to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1+dfsg-1').
